description: Returns settings information for a specified trail.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trail for which you want to retrieve settings information.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the trail set by calling  CreateTrail. The maximum length is 128 characters.

nested_items.name: S3BucketName
nested_items.description: Name of the Amazon S3 bucket into which CloudTrail delivers your trail files. See Amazon S3 Bucket naming rules.

nested_items.name: S3KeyPrefix
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key prefix that comes after the name of the bucket you have designated for log file delivery. For more information, see Finding Your CloudTrail Log Files. The maximum length is 200 characters.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicName
nested_items.description: This field is no longer in use. Use SnsTopicARN.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicARN
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN of the Amazon SNS topic that CloudTrail uses to send notifications when log files are delivered. The following is the format of a topic ARN.

nested_items.name: IncludeGlobalServiceEvents
nested_items.description: Set to True to include Amazon Web Services API calls from Amazon Web Services global services such as IAM. Otherwise, False.

nested_items.name: IsMultiRegionTrail
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the trail exists only in one Region or exists in all Regions.

nested_items.name: HomeRegion
nested_items.description: The Region in which the trail was created.

nested_items.name: TrailARN
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN of the trail. The following is the format of a trail ARN.

nested_items.name: LogFileValidationEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether log file validation is enabled.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsLogGroupArn
nested_items.description: Specifies an Amazon Resource Name (ARN), a unique identifier that represents the log group to which CloudTrail logs will be delivered.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsRoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the role for the CloudWatch Logs endpoint to assume to write to a user's log group.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: Specifies the KMS key ID that encrypts the logs delivered by CloudTrail. The value is a fully specified ARN to a KMS key in the following format.

nested_items.name: HasCustomEventSelectors
nested_items.description: Specifies if the trail has custom event selectors.

nested_items.name: HasInsightSelectors
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a trail has insight types specified in an InsightSelector list.

nested_items.name: IsOrganizationTrail
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the trail is an organization trail.
